instructions: In the Photos app on your Mac, select the photos you want to share. Click the Share button in the toolbar and choose AirDrop. A window appears showing nearby AirDrop users. Note: If you don t see the person that you want to exchange photos with, ask them to turn on AirDrop (on an iPhone or iPad) or open AirDrop in the Finder (on a Mac). Click the name of the person you want to share with, then click Done.
